r.d: Package containes locale validation for ES such as: * DNI * VAT Number (CIF) * Back Account Number * postalCode * Social Security Number
r.n:
Bug #17452 Add check for Bank Account Number Bug #17453 Add check for Postal Code Bug #17454 Add check for CIF Bug #17455 Add check for Social Security Number
Added test for all checks (ccc, cif, dni, ssn and postalCode)
